{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[amuse]]; to [[tease]]
# [[funny]]; [[ridiculous]]; [[amusing]]
# to [[tempt]]; to [[allure]]
# {{lb|zh|usually in the negative}} ('''[[不逗]]''') not to [[play around]]
